card-description: You will need a wallet and an identity on the blockchain to use this platform.

messages.error: Failed to deploy your SMART system

wallet-step-description: Create a secure blockchain wallet to interact with the platform
wallet-explanation: A blockchain wallet is your digital identity that allows you to interact with smart contracts and manage digital assets securely.
wallet-ready-next-step: You're ready to proceed to the next step
wallet-generation-time: This process takes a few seconds
system-step-description: Deploy your blockchain infrastructure for asset tokenization
smart-system-explanation: SMART System is SettleMint's comprehensive blockchain system that enables compliant asset tokenization with built-in identity management and regulatory compliance.
system-deployment-time: This process may take 2-3 minutes to complete
